Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Feature #4: Multi-level summaries \(Quick + Deep\) with status tracking

Implements a 2-level summary system for podcast episodes:
- Quick summaries: Fast scan \(~30s read\) with TL;DR, key takeaways, topics
- Deep summaries: Structured analysis with sections, resources, action items

Backend:
- Database migration \(004\) for transcripts and summaries tables
- Multi-level status tracking: not_ready → queued → transcribing → summarizing → ready/failed
- Idempotent API endpoints \(GET/POST /api/episodes/:id/summaries\)
- Shared transcript generation \(Groq\) used by both summary levels
- Claude Haiku for structured JSON summaries with distinct prompts per level

Frontend:
- SummaryPanel component with Quick/Deep tabs and auto-polling
- SummaryStatusBadge for real-time status display
- Updated EpisodeCard with dynamic button states \(View/Summarize/Summarizing.../Retry\)
- Episode detail page with side panel \(desktop\) / inline \(mobile\) integration

Testing:
- 14 unit tests for types, status flow, idempotency, and API structures
- Added msw and @testing-library/user-event dependencies

Documentation:
- docs/summaries-levels.md: Full system documentation
- docs/assumptions.md: 22 design decisions for Feature #4

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
